title: Particulate diagram - products of 4 H2 and 4 O2

content.question: Which of the following best represents the container after the reaction has gone to completion?

choices.label: The figure presents a particle diagram consisting of four H 2 O molecules.
The figure present a particle diagram consisting of four H 2 O molecules and two O 2 molecules.
The figure presents a particle diagram consisting of four H 2 O molecules and four separated O atoms.
The figure presents a particle diagram consisting of eight H 2 O molecules.

content.answer: The figure present a particle diagram consisting of four H 2 O molecules and two O 2 molecules.

skill.text: 5.E: Determine a balanced chemical equation for a given chemical phenomenon.
